name: AmrutMetal Industries
overview:
Established in the year 2008, we, “Amrut Metal Industries”, are one of the renowned names of the industry engaged in manufacturing and supplying a superior quality range of Sanitary Fittings & Valves. In our product range, we offer 1/2” Fittings Light, Q.T. Flush Fittings Heavy, 1/2” Fittings Heavy, 1/2” Fittings Concealed, 1/2” Operated Fittings and 28 X 1.5 Fittings Regular.

Our Team: Engineers R&D experts Skilled personnel Warehousing experts Logistics personnel Quality controllers

Our Quality: We focus on the quality aspect and make sure to offer the finest range of Sanitary Fittings to the customers. The entire range of products is manufactured using high-grade raw material and by employing latest technology & machinery. Raw material is procured from some of the most trusted vendors of the industry.

Our Infrastructure: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure, equipped with all the advanced facilities that enable us to produce a high quality range of Sanitary Fittings. Our infrastructure is segregated into different units such as designing, production, R&D, quality controlling, warehousing and others.

Client Satisfaction: Our organization aims at offering a world-class range of Sanitary Fittings in the market as per the market demand. The professionals associated with us have perfect knowledge about the requirements of our esteemed patrons and make sure to offer the products accordingly. In order to meet the specific & unique requirements of the clients, we can customise these products as per the exact details provided by the clients.

Why Us?: Some of the factors that have contributed to our market success are as follows: Advance range of products Ethical business approach Timely delivery services Prompt after sales support Competitive pricing policy
